events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but it doesn't fit at all. I want to return it and get a refund as soon as possible because the size guide was misleading.
The customer's message includes a request for a refund due to sizing issues, categorizing this case as a Refund.
An agent from the returns team has been assigned to handle the refund request due to a fit problem.
Hello, thank you for contacting us! I understand you would like to return your jacket and receive a refund. I'm here to assist you.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in its original packaging to process your return?
My order number is 9876543210. The jacket is brand new, still with tags and original packaging intact.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your return authorization and provide you with a prepaid shipping label via email shortly.
Great, thank you for the quick response! I appreciate the prepaid label and will send the jacket back right away.
Your return request is processed. Once we receive the jacket, the refund will be issued within 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you have successfully returned the jacket and everything is on track for your refund.
The refund has been completed and credited to your original payment method. We are closing this case now. Thank you!
Please take a moment to complete our satisfaction survey to help improve our service. Your feedback is important.
